directions: Mix oats, flax seed, almond butter, cocoa nibs, coconut, agave nectar, vanilla extract, and salt in a bowl until evenly moistened. Refrigerate for mixture to slightly solidify, about 30 minutes. Roll mixture into 1-inch balls and arrange in 1 layer in a container; top first layer with waxed paper and arrange a second layer of energy bites atop waxed paper. Continue layering as needed; refrigerate.
ingredients: 1/2 cup agave nectar, or to taste
title: BOP Energy Bites
